description: Try our easy to follow Walnut & Syrup Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Walnut & Syrup Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove from the oven and scatter chocolate bits evenly over the surface while still hot. Cool. Cut into bars.
